trans-unit.source: Ignition Fuel database to download models and worlds
trans-unit.target: 点火燃料数据库下载模型和世界

trans-unit.source: What • Why • How • Demo • Setup • Citation
trans-unit.target: 什么 • 为什么 • 如何 • 演示 • 设置 • 引用

trans-unit.source: Disclaimer: we do not provide support for experimental components.
trans-unit.target: 免责声明：我们不提供对实验组件的支持。

trans-unit.source: Scene Interfaces for Robot Input / Output is a set of C++ interfaces to abstract the interfacing with simulated and real robots.
trans-unit.target: 机器人输入/输出的场景接口是一组C ++接口，用于抽象与模拟和真实机器人的接口。

trans-unit.source: Disclaimer: Gym-Ignition is an independent project and is not related by any means to OpenAI and Open Robotics.
trans-unit.target: 免责声明： Gym-Ignition是一个独立的项目，与OpenAI和Open Robotics没有任何关系。

trans-unit.source: Runtime: implements the actual step of the environment. Simulated runtimes step the simulator, real-time runtimes deal with real-time execution constraints. A Task object can be executed by any runtime without any change.
trans-unit.target: 运行时：实现环境的实际步骤。仿真运行时跨模拟器，实时运行时处理实时执行约束。Task对象可以在任何运行时执行，而无需任何更改。

trans-unit.source: Task: the logic of the decision-making problem. It defines how to process the given action, how to calculate the reward, how to structure the observation, and how to reset the environment. Task objects are robot-independent and runtime-independent.
trans-unit.target: 任务：决策问题的逻辑。它定义了如何处理给定的动作，如何计算奖励，如何构建观察结果以及如何重置环境。任务对象与机械手无关，并且与运行时无关。

trans-unit.source: World: unified interface to access world resources.
trans-unit.target: 世界：访问世界资源的统一界面。

trans-unit.source: Accelerated and multiprocess execution
trans-unit.target: 加速和多进程执行

trans-unit.source: Advances in RL research are pushed by the development of more complex environments, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 更复杂环境的发展推动了RL研究的进步,反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: Alternative solutions are not developed by roboticists for roboticist, and therefore they do not use familiar tools.
trans-unit.target: 替代方案不是由机器人专家为机器人专家开发的,因此他们没有使用熟悉的工具。

trans-unit.source: An experimental C++ port of the OpenAI Gym interfaces, used to create pure C++ environments.
trans-unit.target: OpenAI Gym接口的实验性C ++端口，用于创建纯C ++环境。

trans-unit.source: At the time of writing, Gym-Ignition offers the following features:
trans-unit.target: 在撰写本文时,Gym-Ignition提供了以下功能。

trans-unit.source: C++ utilities developed with a robotic mindset
trans-unit.target: 用机器人思维开发的C++实用程序

trans-unit.source: CI/CD
trans-unit.target: CI/CD

trans-unit.target: 引用

trans-unit.source: Component
trans-unit.target: 组成部分

trans-unit.source: Demo
trans-unit.target: 演示

trans-unit.source: Demo environments created with gym-ignition and gym-ignition-models.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gym-ignition 和Gym-ignition-models创建的演示环境。

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: Environments are a combination of three elements:
trans-unit.target: 环境是三个要素的组合。

trans-unit.source: Environments compatible with OpenAI Gym
trans-unit.target: 与OpenAI Gym兼容的环境

trans-unit.source: Environments that can be transferred from simulation to reality with minimal changes are yet to be seen.
trans-unit.target: 能以最小的变化从模拟转移到现实的环境还有待观察。

trans-unit.source: Existing robotics environments are typically difficult to adapt to run on different physics engines and different robots.
trans-unit.target: 现有的机器人环境通常很难适应在不同物理引擎和不同机器人上运行。

trans-unit.source: Experimental support to create C++ environments
trans-unit.target: 实验性地支持创建C++环境

trans-unit.source: Features
trans-unit.target: 特点

trans-unit.source: Full support of DART and coming support of bullet3
trans-unit.target: 全面支持DART和即将提供的bullet3支持

trans-unit.source: General
trans-unit.target: 一般性

trans-unit.source: Gym-Ignition is a framework to create reproducible robotics environments for reinforcement learning research.
trans-unit.target: Gym-Ignition是一个框架，可用于创建可重现的机器人环境，以进行强化学习研究。

trans-unit.source: Gym-Ignition: A toolkit for developing OpenAI Gym environments simulated with Ignition Gazebo.
trans-unit.target: Gym-Ignition:用Ignition Gazebo模拟开发OpenAI健身房环境的工具包。

trans-unit.source: How
trans-unit.target: 如何

trans-unit.source: Ignition Gazebo bindings that expose the ScenarI/O interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 暴露ScenarI/O接口的Ignition Gazebo绑定。

trans-unit.source: Ignition Robotics is currently under heavy development. Though, it already offers enough functionalities that fit this project's aims:
trans-unit.target: 点火机器人目前正在大力开发中。虽然,它已经提供了足够的功能,符合这个项目的目的。

trans-unit.source: New abstractions of physics engines and rendering engines that exploit runtime plugins
trans-unit.target: 利用运行时插件的物理引擎和渲染引擎的新抽象。

trans-unit.source: New modular architecture
trans-unit.target: 新的模块化结构

trans-unit.source: Only few solutions offer realistic rendering capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 只有少数解决方案能提供真实的渲染功能。

trans-unit.source: Our Gazebo ScenarI/O component provides Python bindings of the simulator that are comparable to other popular solutions like pybullet and mujoco-py.
trans-unit.target: 我们的Gazebo ScenarI / O组件提供了模拟器的Python绑定，可与pybullet和mujoco-py等其他流行的解决方案相提并论。

trans-unit.source: Python package that provides the tooling to create OpenAI Gym environments for robot learning.
trans-unit.target: Python包提供了为机器人学习创建OpenAI Gym环境的工具。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the Citation for the extended rationale behind this project.
trans-unit.target: 有关此项目背后的扩展依据，请参见引文。

trans-unit.source: Reproducibility guarantees
trans-unit.target: 可重复性保证

trans-unit.source: Setup
trans-unit.target: 设置

trans-unit.source: Simulator-as-a-library
trans-unit.target: 模拟器作为一个图书馆

trans-unit.source: Support of distributed simulations
trans-unit.target: 支持分布式模拟

trans-unit.source: The project is composed of the following components:
trans-unit.target: 该项目由以下部分组成:

trans-unit.source: There's no standard framework in the robotics community for creating simulated robotic environments.
trans-unit.target: 在机器人界,没有一个标准的框架来创建模拟机器人环境。

trans-unit.source: This project interfaces with the new generation of the Gazebo simulator, called Ignition Gazebo. It is part of the new Ignition Robotics suite developed by Open Robotics.
trans-unit.target: 该项目与名为Ignition Gazebo的新一代Gazebo仿真器对接。它是Open Robotics开发的新的Ignition Robotics套件的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Visit the Installation section of our website for updated installation instructions. Make sure to select the correct branch since the installation could differ depending on the branch you're interested.
trans-unit.target: 请访问我们网站的“安装”部分以获取更新的安装说明。确保选择正确的分支，因为安装可能会根据您感兴趣的分支而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: We designed Gym-Ignition driven by the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: 我们设计Gym-Ignition是基于以下原因。

trans-unit.source: We provide a docker image that shows few rollouts executed by a random policy on a cartpole model:
trans-unit.target: 我们提供了一个docker镜像,显示了在一个cartpole模型上由随机策略执行的几个推出。

trans-unit.source: Well maintained and packaged
trans-unit.target: 维护和包装良好
